title: Online Library Information Utilization Scenario-Based Instructional Module

context.prior_knowledge: Academic research skills and understanding of basic citation methods
context.additional_context: Aims to develop advanced information literacy skills required for scientific research and report writing. Operates in a blended environment, combining online modules and offline workshops.

learning_goals: Effectively search for and evaluate the latest scientific papers in academic databases.
Select credible reference materials aligned with research topics and cite them in APA style.
Design a collaborative research material management process using online library systems.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
